hero.title: Hacker Typer Online – Eğlence için Sahte Kod Ekranı
hero.description: Kendi sahte hacker ekranınızı online oluşturun! Gerçek bir programcı gibi yazın ve arkadaşlarınızı gerçekçi terminal efektleriyle şakalayın. PinkScreen'de ücretsiz nihai hacker typer simülatörünü deneyin

keywords: hacker simulator, interactive hacker, ethical hacking, cybersecurity training, programming simulator, bitcoin mining simulator, password cracker, nuclear plant control, geek prank hacker

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about the interactive hacker simulator and its advanced features

questions.question: What makes this different from simple hacker typers?
questions.answer: This is a full interactive desktop environment with 10+ working programs including bitcoin mining, password cracking, nuclear plant control, server access, and more - not just typing simulation.

questions.question: What interactive programs are included?
questions.answer: Bitcoin mining with real-time data, password cracking with visual progress, nuclear plant control panel, main server access, remote connections, and 5+ passive windows for various scenarios.

questions.question: How do I use all the features?
questions.answer: Type randomly for code simulation, click right-side icons to open interactive programs, press number keys (0-9) for passive windows, drag windows around, and use Space to close passive windows.

questions.question: Is this suitable for cybersecurity training?
questions.answer: Absolutely! It provides realistic cybersecurity interfaces and scenarios perfect for ethical hacking education, security awareness training, and IT demonstrations.

questions.question: Can I use this for professional presentations?
questions.answer: Yes! Many cybersecurity professionals, educators, and content creators use this for training sessions, presentations, and educational demonstrations due to its realistic features.

additionalTools.title: Additional Screen Tools
additionalTools.description: Explore our collection of specialized screen tools for various purposes.

howToUse.title: How to Use
steps: Click the launch button to enter fullscreen interactive hacker simulator
Start typing random keys to simulate hacking code automatically
Click icons on the right side to open interactive programs and tools
Press number keys (0-9) to display passive program windows and alerts
Drag windows around the desktop to organize your hacker workspace
Use Space key to close passive windows, ESC to exit fullscreen mode

howToUse.title: 🧭 Hacker simülatörü nasıl kullanılır
howToUse.description: Gerçekçi hacker efektleri oluşturmayı ve etkileşimli simülatörümüzle arkadaşlarınızla şaka yapmayı öğrenin
steps: Sayfayı aç - Masaüstü tarayıcında hacker-typer'a git
Tam ekran - "Hacker simülatörünü başlat"a tıkla veya tam ekran moduna geçmek için F11'e bas
Yazmaya başla - Klavyende herhangi bir şey yazarak ekranda gerçekçi kod görünmesini sağla
Klavye kısayollarını kullan - "ERİŞİM İZİN VERİLDİ" için ALT, "ERİŞİM REDDEDİLDİ" için ENTER veya güvenlik uyarıları için CTRL'e bas
Sayı tuşlarını dene - Farklı hacker programları ve pencereleri açmak için 1-5'e bas

techSpecs.title: Technical Specifications
specs: Desktop: Full interactive hacker desktop environment with taskbar
Features: Real-time bitcoin mining, password cracking animations
Interaction: Draggable windows, keyboard shortcuts, window management
Compatibility: All modern browsers with full keyboard and mouse support
Education: Perfect for advanced cybersecurity and ethical hacking demonstrations
